name: @cloudcare/browser-rum

scripts.build:cjs: rm -rf cjs && babel --config-file ./babel.cjs.json --out-dir cjs ./src  && npm run replace-build-env cjs
scripts.build:esm: rm -rf esm && babel --config-file ./babel.esm.json --out-dir esm ./src && npm run replace-build-env esm
scripts.build:bundle: rm -rf bundle && webpack --config webpack.config.js --mode=production && npm run replace-build-env bundle
scripts.publish:npm: npm run build && node ./scripts/publish-oss.js && npm publish --access=public

author: dataflux
description: DataFlux RUM Web 端数据指标监控
